com.tabuto.j2dgf
Class SpriteGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.tabuto.j2dgf.SpriteGroup
Deprecated. Use class Group instead 

public class SpriteGroup
extends java.lang.Object

The SpirteGroup class provide to manage a SpriteGroup like a Vector of Objects.

Like any other vector is possible to add or remove an element.

Version:
0.5.0
Author:
tabuto83
